data.text:
Oliver Parker

Chief Commercial Officer, Blackbird

Oliver Parker is the chief commercial officer at Blackbird since 2018. His focus is on strategic commercial growth, bringing many years of experience managing sales across global territories for both established technology providers and smaller, high-growth suppliers in the broadcast and M&E industries.

With a background in operations including five years at Sky UK, Parker has a keen knowledge of technology and the industry landscape.
